p: The least significant difference (L.S.D) test was employed to compare the difference between treatments. All analyses were accomplished in triplicates and data stated as ± standard error (SE). Data were submitted to analysis of variance (ANOVA). The confidence limits in the present study were based on ( P < 0.01). The LSD and ANOVA tests were applied to indicate the mean values of the examined parameters using ASSISTAT Version 7.7 beta (2014).
